name: Apartment 3301
description: Congratulations. You have found the application test. You are trapped in a lock apartment and must find clues on how to escape.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core at 2.5 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 640 1GB GDDR3 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 Bit Processor: Quad Core i3 at 2.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 760 2GB GDDR5 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
